data.title: Mary Frances Early College of Education
data.text:
College of Education Honor Roll

Thanks to our donors, the Mary Frances Early College of Education continues to be a leader in research, teaching, and service for future educators, exercise and sports scientists, councilors and human development professionals, and organizational leaders. We want to recognize the donors who continue to support our initiatives, and we list the names of our donors over the past fiscal year (July 1, 2022 - June 30, 2023) here on our website.
